issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

fixVersions.description: Windows Platform Support, ListView updates, Vector overlays in maps
fixVersions.name: Release 4.1.0

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We have a number of warnings in the Titanium SDK for a variety of issues, including deprecation warnings, issues about raw types, etc. We should correct them

# Import Titanium SDK Android projects into Eclipse.
# No warnings or errors should appear.
fields.summary: Android: Remove or fix warnings in Titanium SDK

comments.body:
* BitmapDrawable(Bitmap) is deprecated: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/26832050/the-constructor-bitmapdrawable-is-deprecated-fix
* BitmapFactory.options.inPurgeable is deprecated: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/graphics/BitmapFactory.Options.html#inPurgeable
* BitmapFactory.options.inInputShareable: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/graphics/BitmapFactory.Options.html#inInputShareable
* Sensor.TYPE_ORIENTATION is deprecated: http://www.codingforandroid.com/2011/01/using-orientation-sensors-simple.html
* LocalActivityManager is deprecated. Use Fragment and FragmentManager instead
PR for some other easier-to-fix issues: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6678
